main.message: Transforming ideas into code and dreams into reality.
main.aboutMe: Nice to meet you, I'm Caio Henrique Rodrigues, a 22-year-old full-stack developer. I am currently in my final year of Information Systems at Unifafibe University. My initial education in Systems Development at Etec Bebedouro provided me with a solid foundation in the field. I am seeking opportunities to expand my knowledge and face new challenges. My passion for technology and innovation drives me to pursue creative and high-quality solutions. Currently, I work as a full-stack developer and I am eager to contribute to projects that challenge my skills and provide a significant impact on our society.
main.project2C: The 2C Project is an innovative idea in combating fraud. It is the integration of an open-source biometric engine made with Rust, which has the ability to compare faces and score the similarity between compared faces.
main.barberPass: This is a project focused on generating passwords remotely for barbers and hairdressers. It generates a password to reserve your place in line, allowing the professional to manage arrival times more easily without issues with people outside the queue.
main.newXp: This is a Pomodoro timer created for developers and students. When the timer reaches zero, a basic exercise is generated to perform after long periods in front of a computer.
main.high: A project aimed at people who want to improve or rank up in the game League of Legends. The project includes a complete admin panel and a modern, attractive design.
main.infoCookies: This website uses cookies to improve your browsing experience and offer personalized content. By continuing to browse, you agree to the use of cookies.
